text: American Tourister is a brand of luggage owned by Samsonite. Brothers Sol and Irving Koffler founded American Luggage Works in Providence, Rhode Island, United States in 1933. In 2009, American Tourister was acquired by Astrum International, which also owns Samsonite.Stephanie Strom. " Wall Street; New Name, New Life, for Astrum. New York Times. September 26, 1993. Retrieved on November 2, 2008. Astrum was renamed the Samsonite Corporation two years later." Astrum International to Divide Its Samsonite and Culligan Units". New York Times. April 25, 1995. Retrieved on November 2, 2008. Their products include suitcases, backpacks and wallets. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Luggage brands Category:Companies based in Rhode Island Category:Samsonite
title: American Tourister
